page.title: 05HOUSING IN ICKENHAM
page.content: Ickenham is mainly a residential area All the houses are privately owned and there are no council houses in the area we covered.Most houses have three bedrooms,but some have four. Quite a few houses have had extensions or converted garages. Most houses in Ickenham were built in the "1930's" so they are all quite new. The area is quite built up but there are a few greenland areas eg.parks,greens etc. Most of the houses are semi-detatched and cost over Â£50,000 . The shops in Ickenham are all small stores and most of them are joined onto each other along one side of the road. They all have flats above them in which some of the shopkeepers live.
